bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for the Measurement of Sound Pressure Levels of Outdoor Power Circuit Breakers
IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for the Measurement of Sound Pressure Levels of Outdoor Power Circuit Breakers
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC37.082_IEC62271-113/D2, Jan 2010

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard provides methods for the measurement of sound pressure level produced by outdoor power circuit-breakers in a free-field environment. These methods may also be used indoors or in restricted field, provided that precautions are observed in the measurement and interpretation of the results.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
